projects.title: Prompt2Mail - AI Email MCP Server
projects.shortDescription: Transform short prompts into polished professional emails with attachments via Claude Desktop integration.
projects.fullDescription: A FastMCP server that transforms short prompts into polished professional emails and sends them via Gmail SMTP, integrated directly into Claude Desktop. Type 'meeting tomorrow at 2pm' and Gemini expands it into a complete email with subject, greeting, body, and closing.
projects.keyInnovation: Three-tool MCP workflow with file attachment support - list files, save uploaded content to temp directory, and send emails with MIME encoding
features: AI Email Enhancement - Gemini 2.5-flash expands brief ideas into complete professional emails with all components
File Attachments - Three-tool workflow: list_attachments browses, save_temp_file saves uploads, send_professional_email attaches with MIME
Multi-Recipient Support - Send to multiple people (comma-separated), each gets individual email with CC/BCC support
Tone Customization - Professional (default), friendly, or formal tone - AI adjusts writing style
Robust Error Handling - JSON parsing fallbacks, detailed attachment tracking, per-recipient SMTP error reporting
STDIO Transport - All stdout logging suppressed for clean MCP protocol, Windows encoding fixes applied
Secure Configuration - Credentials in .env protected by .gitignore, Gmail app password authentication
Detailed Status Reports - Shows which files attached vs missing, which emails succeeded/failed

projects.title: Adaptive Quiz Engine with AI-Powered Learning
projects.shortDescription: AI-powered learning platform using IRT algorithms and Google Gemini for personalized quizzes.
projects.fullDescription: An intelligent, personalized learning platform that adapts to student ability in real-time using psychometric algorithms and generative AI. Unlike traditional quiz apps that present static questions, this platform uses Item Response Theory (IRT) â€” the same psychometric framework used in standardized tests like GRE, GMAT, and SAT â€” combined with Google Gemini 2.5 AI to generate contextually relevant questions at precisely calibrated difficulty levels.
projects.keyInnovation: Combines Item Response Theory with Google Gemini 2.5 AI for real-time adaptive difficulty adjustment
features: Adaptive Difficulty Engine using 3-Parameter Logistic IRT Model with Bayesian updating
AI-Powered Question Generation with Google Gemini 2.5 Flash API
Document-Based Learning with PDF upload and RAG pipeline
Advanced Analytics Dashboard with real-time performance tracking
Firebase Cloud Integration with offline-first architecture

algorithms.irt3PL: Item Response Theory 3-Parameter Logistic Model for ability estimation
algorithms.bayesian: Bayesian theta estimation with Maximum A Posteriori optimization
algorithms.rag: Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline with smart chunking and keyword-based retrieval

challengesSolved.problem: How to adjust difficulty dynamically without frustrating users or making quizzes too easy
challengesSolved.solution: Implemented Bayesian IRT with informative priors to prevent wild ability swings. Added learning rate (0.7) and max theta change constraints (Â±1.5). Used exponential smoothing for gradual difficulty transitions.

challengesSolved.problem: Gemini API calls took 5-30 seconds, creating poor UX
challengesSolved.solution: Question pooling - pre-generate 5 questions, serve instantly from pool. Background refill while user answers. Smart caching. Timeout optimization. Result: Average latency reduced from 15s â†’ <2s

challengesSolved.problem: AI might generate repetitive questions, frustrating users
challengesSolved.solution: Implemented fuzzy string matching with Levenshtein distance. Track previous questions and send to Gemini as negative examples. 70% similarity threshold triggers rejection.

challengesSolved.problem: Large PDFs exceed Gemini's 8K token context limit
challengesSolved.solution: Intelligent chunking (500 tokens/chunk with 50-token overlap). RAG pipeline retrieves only top-5 most relevant chunks. TF-IDF scoring for semantic relevance. Chapter filtering for specific document sections.

achievements: Implemented production-grade IRT algorithm from academic papers
Reduced AI response latency by 90% through intelligent pooling and caching
Built complete RAG pipeline with PDF processing, chunking, and retrieval
Designed scalable architecture supporting 1,000+ concurrent users
Delivered full-stack solution from UI to cloud infrastructure

projects.title: ProBuddy - Professional Networking App
projects.shortDescription: Swipe-based professional networking app for developers with real-time messaging.
projects.fullDescription: ProBuddy is a mobile application that revolutionizes professional networking for software developers and tech professionals. Built with Flutter and Firebase, it combines the engaging swipe mechanics of modern dating apps with professional networking features, making it easy and fun to find collaborators, discover projects, and build meaningful professional connections.
projects.problemStatement: Traditional professional networking platforms often feel formal and time-consuming. Developers need a more engaging, intuitive way to discover project collaboration opportunities, connect with like-minded professionals, showcase their skills and projects, and find teammates for hackathons and side projects.

Dynamic User Profiles with customizable professional profiles, project portfolio integration, and real-time avatar generation using DiceBear API
Intelligent Search & Filtering with multi-criteria filtering (Skills, Location, Experience) and tag-based categorization
Connection Management System - send and receive connection requests, accept/reject functionality

Turn-Based Drawing - players take turns being the drawer who illustrates a word
Word Guessing - other players compete to guess the word by typing in chat

Customizable Drawing - 20+ color palette options, 6 different brush sizes (2px - 20px)
Timed Rounds - 80-second countdown timer for each drawing session
Live Chat System - real-time messaging for guesses and communication
Score Tracking - automatic scoring system for correct guesses

gameFlow: Room Creation/Joining - Generate unique room IDs, Firebase room document creation, Player registration in room

challengesSolved.problem: Users couldn't change attendance from Present to Absent for current or previously marked days
rootCauses: In-memory caching conflicts with database state
Provider layer not reflecting immediate database changes
Inconsistent handling of hours/extraHours during status transitions
challengesSolved.solution: Created EnhancedAttendanceScreen with direct database access. Implemented atomic database transactions using rawUpdate for guaranteed updates. Added manual database refresh after each status change. Force hours and extraHours to 0.0 for Absent/Leave statuses at SQL level. Implemented local caching with explicit cache invalidation.

challengesSolved.problem: SQLite doesn't work directly on web browsers
challengesSolved.solution: Implemented sqflite_common_ffi_web for web platform. Conditional initialization based on platform detection. Maintained single codebase for all platforms.
